troubleshooting.title: Emails Not Being Received from Oxygen Feedback

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: Emails (such as invitation emails, notifications when a comment receives a reply, notifications of user role changes, etc.) are not being received from .

cause.title: Possible Solutions
cause.p:
To address issues with not receiving emails from the Feedback system, try the following possible solutions:
Check Your Emails Settings - Ensure that your email settings are correctly configured to receive notifications from the Feedback system.
Verify Your Role - Make sure you have the appropriate role (e.g. Owner, Admin) that allows you to receive email notifications. You can check your role in the Management Team page.
Check Spam/Junk Folder - It is possible for Feedback emails to end up in your spam or junk folder. Make sure to check these folders and mark these emails as not spam.
Remove Email Filters - Ensure that there are no email filters set up that might be redirecting the feedback emails to another folder.
Contact Support - If you have tried all of the above and are still not receiving emails, you can contact the support team for further assistance by using the Technical Support page.
